Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui

Class TuiView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.View
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.BaseTuiView
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.client.tui.TuiView
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventEmitter<ViewEvent>
public class TuiView extends BaseTuiView
The specific class for the text user interface. It handles the rendering of the TUI and the input from the keyboard.

It contains the state of the application and composes the component tree based on it.

    • kickPlayer

      protected void kickPlayer()
      Gets called to notify that the player has been kicked from the game.

      The only reason why this would happen is that there aren't enough players connected during the initial selection phase, so the game is canceled.

      Specified by:
      kickPlayer in class View

    • connectionLost

      public void connectionLost()
      It set the ClientState to ClientState.NOT_CONNECTED It also renders an error message.
      Overrides:
      connectionLost in class View
      See Also:

    • flipCard

      public void flipCard(int cardIndex)
      Flips the card at the given index in the hand of the player.

      Flipping means switching the visible side of the card between Side.FRONT and Side.BACK.

      Parameters:
      cardIndex - the index of the card to flip
